definition.achievementDescription: §bAbility 1 (+Sneak) - A small shift in the magnetic field quickly attracts electrons to whatever you're looking at. Cooldown: 4 Minutes (Less cooldown time with Power Levels and based on how heavy is the weather) [Grants Power XP]
